attributes.title: Contentsquare Virtual Breakfast Panel, with Fabian Kersten, Bas van Dijk & Lucas Vos
attributes.summary:
Recorded on Thursday July 16th, 2020. As a part of the Virtual Champagne Breakfast session hosted by ContentSquare and ClickValue we did a CRO.CAFE panel session with:
* Bas van Dijk - Senior Customer Journey Specialist at Bol.com
* Fabian Kersten - Director Digital Marketing, Sales & Service at Leaseplan
* Lucas Vos - Optimizing online platforms at RTL Nederland
attributes.description: Guest 1: Fabian Kersten URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/fabian-kersten | Guest 2: Lucas Vos URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/lucas-vos | Guest 3: Bas van Dijk URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/bas-van-dijk
